title.rendered: Smile foundation conducts Emotional Wellbeing Workshops in Delhi Schools

content.rendered:
Smile foundation conducts Emotional Wellbeing Workshops in Schools in Delhi for teachers under the Child for Child Programme in June 2023.  

Under the Emotional Wellbeing programme, the workshop was organised at Delhi International School Edge with a group of 26 Teachers who also went through deep healing mostly around their nervous system. Most of the teachers experienced relief from aches and pains, especially in knee and backbone areas. The group healing and meditation were deeply enjoyed by all. 

This workshop was conducted by Mr. Amit Singh, a renowned Energy Healer and Emotional Wellbeing Transformationist.

 Mr. Amit Singh taught Emotion Deletion Method (EDM) over a period of two days where the teachers learned how to delete/release their unfavourable emotions and belief systems that were affecting their mental and physical health.  The Fun-filled learning and ameliorating sessions were nothing short of amazing.
